name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Solutions Engineer with 13+ years of experience in designing and implementing SaaS solutions within the healthcare and financial sectors. Proficient in **AWS**, **Azure**, and skilled in creating API workflows and technical proof of concepts that enhance customer engagement and collaboration. Strong ability to utilize **GitHub**, **BitBucket**, and **GitLab** for efficient version control and team collaboration. 
Expert in delivering impactful communication through analytical thinking and problem-solving, ensuring seamless integration of technologies like **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, **Flutter**, **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. 
Well-versed in developing AI/ML-powered platforms, deploying cloud-native systems, and implementing microservices and event-driven architectures. Experienced in aligning solutions with compliance standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2, alongside a strong background in MLOps using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.

- Optimized existing healthcare applications, leading to a **30%** reduction in processing time through strategic integration of **GCP** services for back-end processing.
- Utilized **Okta** for secure user authentication and authorization processes, enhancing the security protocols of applications by over **40%**.

- Implemented advanced testing strategies leveraging tools such as Jest and Cypress to ensure robust application integrity, achieving over **90%** test coverage across multiple products.

Utilized **AWS**, **Azure**, and **GCP** to implement scalable **SaaS** solutions, driving seamless customer engagement and enhancing service delivery.
Conducted technical proof of concepts to validate architectural decisions, demonstrating impactful communication and collaboration with cross-functional teams, leading to a **25%** reduction in deployment time.
Designed and implemented secure **API workflows** with **Okta** and **Entra ID**, ensuring robust identity management and authentication for both internal and external applications, improving user experience by **30%**.
Modernized core financial platforms by migrating to microservices architecture using **Node.js** (NestJS/Express) and **Python** (FastAPI, Django), enhancing scalability and performance for high-volume transactional systems.
Built interactive front-end applications with **React** (18), **Vue 3**, **Next.js**, and **TypeScript**, utilizing **Redux Toolkit** and **Tailwind CSS** to create sleek, responsive interfaces for financial tools and admin panels.
Delivered real-time analytics dashboards with **React**, **D3.js**, and **Power BI Embedded**, providing operations teams with instant insights into transactions and anomalies, leading to a **15%** increase in operational efficiency.
Developed **ETL** pipelines for ingesting financial data from internal and third-party sources using **Python**, **Apache Airflow**, and **Azure Data Factory**, supporting both batch and real-time processing.
Designed and deployed a robust event-driven architecture using **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus**, ensuring asynchronous communication across critical workflows such as payments, alerts, and compliance.
Built and deployed machine learning models for fraud detection using **scikit-learn**, **XGBoost**, and **Azure ML**, enabling proactive detection of suspicious activity based on user behavior and transaction patterns.
Created ML pipelines for real-time credit scoring, churn prediction, and transaction classification, leveraging **MLflow** and **Airflow** to integrate model inference into backend services.

Collaborated on technical proof of concepts to demonstrate and validate **SaaS** solutions, ensuring alignment with client needs and enhancing customer engagement.
Designed and optimized scalable backend services for a global e-commerce platform using **Python** (FastAPI, Django) and **Node.js** (NestJS, Express), achieving **99.9%** uptime and response times under **200ms** across key modules like checkout, cart, and order fulfillment.
Engineered real-time features using **WebSockets** and event-driven architecture powered by **Kafka** and **RabbitMQ**, resulting in **30%** faster order updates and dynamic inventory tracking.
Developed user-centric frontend applications using **React** (18), **Vue 3**, and **Angular**, enhanced with **TypeScript**, **Redux Toolkit**, and **Tailwind CSS**, improving user satisfaction metrics by **25%**.
Leveraged **MongoDB**, **PostgreSQL**, **Redis**, and **Cassandra** for distributed data storage, ensuring **50%** faster access to high-traffic e-commerce workflows and effectively caching frequently accessed resources.
Integrated AI/ML-based recommendation engines utilizing **scikit-learn**, **LightGBM**, and **TensorFlow**, enhancing product relevance and improving conversion rates by **40%** using real-time behavioral data.
Implemented **Redis** caching for product metadata, shopping cart sessions, and search results, significantly improving application responsiveness and reducing database read pressure by **20%**.
Utilized feature flags and blue-green deployments with **LaunchDarkly** and **Kubernetes** namespaces for controlled rollouts and A/B testing, actively managing risk during deployments.
Created responsive, SEO-friendly e-commerce UIs using **Next.js**, **Vue 3** + **Nuxt**, and **HTML5/CSS3**, optimized for mobile-first engagement and compliance with accessibility standards (WCAG 2.1).
Built secure payment workflows integrated with **Stripe**, **PayPal**, and **Razorpay**, ensuring PCI compliance for handling sensitive data through tokenized transactions.
Applied role-based access control (RBAC) and **OAuth 2.0** for secure customer and admin access, fully complying with GDPR regulations and enhancing platform security.
